attributes.action: Append a box for Sikh as an ethnicity in the Census 2011
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear PM,

The preparation for next year's census is underway.

In the Census we Sikh want to be recognised as an individual race and not just a religion.

The case has already been won in High Court battle in the 1980s for we Sikhs to be officially recognised as a race under British law. Therefor I urge you to take our voice forward. We are a peace loving community and do not mean harm to anyone. All we therefore ask is for us to be categorised correctly to avoid confusions amongst other communities. 

I hope you would take our points in mind when deciding the petition results.

Sincerely,

Khushwant Singh
